item.description:
Lets hike the Moats end to end! We'll start out at the south end of the range and hike up the Moat Mountain Trail to summit South, Middle and North Moat Mountains. The trailhead is right off of Dugway Road (Passaconaway Road becomes Dugway Road). We will descend on either the Moat Mountain Trail or the Red Ridge Trail. The hike will cover roughly 10 miles. There are water crossings and the trail conditions will likely be mixed so be prepared for...water, mud, snow and ice.

Winter gear required!

snowshoes
traction
warm/waterproof boots
gaiters
warm/waterproof/windproof layers
headlamp/batteries
food/water
map/compass
first aid kit

http://www.hikesafe.c...

Your response/signing up for a hike certifies that you have read, understand, and agree with the NEHAAG disclaimer.

http://www.meetup.com...

The forecast for Sunday as of Friday evening...mostly sunny, temperature in the 40's, north wind at 10 mph.
item.name: The Moats!
